mapper.select: select a.*,d.name as prod_name,d.style as prod_style ,e.name as subtype_name,f.name as brand_name ,g.name as str_out_name from ems_repair a left join ems_equipmentprod d on a.prod_id=d.id left join ems_equipmentsubtype e on d.subtype_id=e.id left join ems_brand f on d.brand_id=f.id left join ems_store g on a.str_out_id=g.id where to_char(a.str_in_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') <= #{date_end} and to_char(a.str_in_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') >= #{date_start} and a.status in ('over','scrap')
